definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: They will study at home on computers.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在家用电脑上课。

sentences.english: They kept badgering him to get a home computer.
sentences.chinese: 他们总是缠着他买一台家用电脑。

sentences.english: I send my household computer to be repaired.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的家用电脑送去维修了。

sentences.english: Sales of home computers have taken off in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 家用电脑的销量近年来上升很快。

sentences.english: The needs of personal computers were surging in the first half of the year.
sentences.chinese: 今年上半年，家用电脑的需求量不断猛增。

sentences.english: This company used to specialize in producing home computers.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司过去专门生产家用电脑。

sentences.english: The price of personal computers will sink again.
sentences.chinese: 家用电脑的价格还要降。

sentences.english: Pattern recognition software on home computers would seem a perfect tool.
sentences.chinese: 家用电脑上的模式识别软件看起来是个完美的工具。

sentences.english: The multimedia household computer is a high-tech product and a good hand AT home.
sentences.chinese: 家用电脑外设多媒体，高技术产品，家庭好助手。

sentences.english: Officers seized documents and a computer from Chan's home in Gough Hill Road on The Peak.
sentences.chinese: 检获的文件和从安生在歌赋山道家用电脑上山顶。

sentences.english: Why do home-schooling parents keep their children to study at home?
sentences.chinese: 在家用电脑学习的好处有什么？

definition: variant of 因特網|因特网[Yin1 te4 wang3], Internet
